ygData.subject: Re: ARGH
ygData.msgSnippet: you don t get to specialize till lv 30...that s why you don t have it (:
ygData.messageBody:
you don't get to specialize till lv 30...that's why you don't have it (:

Dan Harmon wrote:

> From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
>
> I must be missing a very basic piece of information or just suffering from
> brain fart. Assume that I don't have a clue and am probably talking about
> something different than what YOU mean. :)
>
> I'm a lvl 13 cleric. Abjuration, alteration, evocation are AT LEAST at
> skill lvl 60, and probably divination and conjuration are pretty high as
> well. How can that be explained?
>
> I haven't noticed any better casting ability in any of my spells. How can
> that be explained?
>
> If I HAVE specialized, how can I tell which one it is?(they went over 50
> about 3 weeks ago...I don't have a clue which was first).
>
> If I HAVEN'T specialized, how do I do it?
> If I HAVEN'T specialized, what happens to the other 2-4 spell classes that
> have already gone over 50? Do they stay at 65, or do they drop back down?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> > You can specialize in all spell types. But, once one reaches 51 the rest
> > will cap at 50, and the skill that reached 51 first will keep increasing.
> > I am level 30 I trained as much as I could in alteration and I havent
> > touched the other specialization skills, I want to make sure my specialize
> > in alt. is the first to hit 51
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
